insert into schedule (order_id, customer_name, file_number, `date`, production_quantity, line_number ) values
(#{item.orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.productionQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.lineNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER})
